Caption: Chief guest Mr. C. Rajagopalachari gives Gurusharan S. Sidhu his B. Tech., Mechanical Engineering degree, along with the President's Prize for the year 1967.
Description: The President’s Prize was awarded to the best student of the B. Tech. Degree Course. Gurusharan S. Sidhu, who won the prize in 1967. In Vol. V, No. 4 of Campastimes (April 1967), R. K. Prakash’s humorous poem titled ‘Sidhu’ accompanied by a caricature of Sidhu, by Vasu, describes Sidhu’s academic prowess. The poem makes note of Sidhu’s incomparable nature; “Few guys can with Sidhu compare, / In his work, no efforts does he spare”.
